summary: Laos. In a land ravaged by war and exploitation, a boy whose family believe he is cursed must redeem himself by taking part in a dangerous rocket competition.
cast: Boonsri Yindee|Alice Keohavong|Karen|Sitthiphon Disamoe|Chanthachone Latvongxay|Sumrit Warin|Samnuan Sankote|Jarunun Phantachat|Walter Van Veenendaal|Yuttana Muenwaja|Chaleam Ratchaborntong|Wattana Klumkrong|Suthep Po-ngam|Loungnam Kaosainam|Sopheng Thammavong|Jittakan Chuannok|Nokaeo Chantatham|Wutthikorn Liyeeke|Udon Seesawat|Souphonie Fonglanat|Leuthmany Insichiangsmai|Bunprasoet Insichiangsmai|Aratchaporn Sataed|Chorru|Kopkaeo Wonratham|James Brown
title: The Rocket
